1.0.name: wordpress/my-reading-library
1.0.description:
My Reading Library is a very heavy modification of the Now Reading Redux plugin by Ashod Nakashian which is a resurrection of the Now Reading Reloaded plugin by Ben Gunnink which is a fork of the Now Reading plugin by Rob Miller.

It allows you to develop a library, show the book details, track your progress, rate the book, and link to a WP post of your book review. It displays the library within the sidebar and on the library/book page with cover art fetched from Amazon.

The home of the My Reading Library plugin is in this WP Repository; however, you may report bugs and receive support: http://www.affordable-techsupport.com/s
